name: Thomas BERKELBAUGH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Berkelbaugh v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Thomas BERKELBAUGH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of February, 2001, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
767 A.2d 546
Thomas BERKELBAUGH, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 9, 2001.
